file_content.text: Nok Drayen... Nok Drayen... that's all I hear. "What was it like to fight Nok Drayen?"
The next time some fool asks me that, I'll bury this holorecording in his forehead and play it back for the survivors.
Nok Drayen was never a true gangster--not like me. He just pretended.
People think I fought him because he was more successful. Because he made me "number two." Because he stole my wife. Lies!
I fought him because he was no more a gangster than I'm a Senator.
Nok was a con artist. The whole underworld was his mark. He was using us for... something. Don't know what.
But I do know he never gave a damn about being "King of the Underworld." It was all just a game.
At least that pile of filth is finally dead. I raided his storehouse just to be sure. He never came.
I'm still alive, and he's not. I won.
You hear that, Nok? I won!
